full_summary:
# Air Charter Services to Sable Island National Park Reserve

### Solicitation Details

*   Reference Number: WS3843612034-Doc3847027508
*   Solicitation Number: WS3843612034
*   Publication Date: February 14, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: March 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

### Service Requirement

*   The provision of air charter services from Sable Island National Park Reserve to support the operations of the Government of Canada.
*   The services will be provided using a fixed-wing aircraft capable of carrying passengers and cargo that may contain dangerous goods in various configurations.

### Selection Criteria

*   Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

### Notice Information

*   The contract notice was posted on Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15416603) and on CanadaBuys (the details may not be available for some reason, we have the actual details below)
    http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15416603?extsite=MTU0MTY2MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

# Response Contact Information

*   Kingsley Glover, SPAC/PSPC, ([kingsley.glover@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kingsley.glover@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca))
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Phone number: None
*   Fax number: None

### Conditions of Tender

*   The deadline for submitting bids has been extended to March 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
*   Bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive and will not be accepted. Therefore, please submit your bids by these deadlines.
